name: @novicell/styles-breadcrumb
description: The stylesheet for @novicell/breadcrumb as compiled CSS and raw postCSS.
author: Magnus Bendix Borregaard <mbb@novicell.dk>

scripts.build:src: npm run lint:fix && parcel build src/*.css --no-content-hash --no-source-maps --no-minify -d dist/src --no-cache
scripts.build:dist: npm run lint:fix && cross-env NODE_ENV=compile parcel build src/*.css --no-content-hash --no-source-maps --no-cache
scripts.build: npm run build:src && npm run build:dist
